summary:
I didn\'t think Brynjolf was a bit too messy for a thief, so i made him more \"slick\" and \"cocky\" looking.
The reason i made him black is because i think there needs more black people in this game.

I didn\'t use Vanilla, so it might mess it up a little.

______________________________________________________________________________________
descriptionHtml:
I didn\'t think Brynjolf was a bit too messy for a thief, so i made him more \"slick\" and \"cocky\" looking.
The reason i made him black is because i think there needs more black people in this game.

I didn\'t use Vanilla, so it can mess it up a little.

_________________________________________________________________________________________
LISTEN UP!
The reason i made this one is because i realized that almost all the \"main characters\" in guilds are white. Which i thought was weird, i didn\'t make this because i\'m racist or anything, i just thought it was weird that the only black people in this game are the ones with small missions or the \"followers\" in a guild. I dont know if it made any sense, what i just wrote. But the bottom line is: 
I\'m not racist and this is not made to piss anyone off. <3
And for those who still thinks its racist, or whatever, i put up a Nord version of this mod.
_________________________________________________________________________________________
author: Mullix
